pages.description: Integrate with the BanManager API to manage punishments and be notified of changes via custom events.

pages.title: config.yml
pages.description: BanManager offers flexibility by providing a large range of configuration options found here.

pages.title: console.yml
pages.description: This configuration file defines properties to identify punishments issued via the console.

pages.title: discord.yml (Deprecated)
pages.description: Legacy Discord integration for BanManager versions prior to v7.10.

pages.title: exemptions.yml
pages.description: List players to exempt them from punishments, even when they are offline.

pages.title: geoip.yml
pages.description: GeoIP functions adds geofencing capabilities to your Minecraft server

pages.title: Configuration
pages.description: Learn more about the configuration files used by BanManager to manage your server.

pages.title: messages.yml
pages.description: All messages can be fully customised, supporting JSON, colour codes and more!

pages.title: reasons.yml
pages.description: Set shortcuts for reasons for a consistent banning process.

pages.title: schedules.yml
pages.description: Control how often BanManager syncs data between the database and the Minecraft server.

pages.title: velocity.yml
pages.description: Velocity-specific configuration options for BanManager.

pages.title: webhooks.yml
pages.description: Send punishment notifications to Discord, Slack, or any HTTP endpoint via webhooks.
